passive_aggressive.text: Wow. Okay. That was... a choice.
I'm just gonna jam for a second. Take a breather. Think about your aim.
You know, Knifey wouldn't miss that. Just saying.
Are you doing a pacifist run? Because you're nailing it.

awkward.text: Okay, we've been staring at this alien for a solid minute.
He's looking at me looking at you looking at him. I hate this.
Can we just shoot something? The silence is loud.

hype.text: OHHH! DID YOU SEE THAT?! THAT WAS ALL ME!

panic.text: Oh god, oh god, that's a lot of teeth.
Don't drop me! My skin is sensitive!
